text: Quezon is a province in the Philippines. It is in the Calabarzon region. The capital is Lucena City in Metro Lucena. ==Major highways== * Manilaâ€“Bicol National Road ==Adjacent provinces== * Aurora (north) * Bulacan (northwest) * Rizal (west) * Laguna (west) * Batangas (southwest) * Camarines Norte (east) * Camarines Sur (southeast) ==Communities== Quezon has 2 cities and 39 municipalities. ===Cities=== * Lucena City (capital city) * Tayabas (component city) ===Municipalities=== * Agdangan * Alabat * Atimonan * Buenavista * Burdeos * Calauag * Candelaria * Catanauan * Dolores * General Luna * General Nakar | * Guinayangan * Gumaca * Infanta * Jomalig * Lopez * Lucban * Macalelon * Mauban * Mulanay * Padre Burgos * Panungkulan * Pagbilao | * Patnanungan * Perez * Pitogo * Plaridel * Real * Sampaloc * San Andres * San Antonio * San Narciso * Sariaya * Tagkawayan * Unisan
title: Quezon
